hopobject.name: Beagledroid
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10_5_6; en-us) AppleWebKit/525.27.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/3.2.1 Safari/525.27.1
hopobject.body:
Based on NthCode's experience porting Android to a Nokia N810, as well as the work of other community members, we have ported the latest Android Cupcake release to run on the BeagleBoard. Much thanks to Embinux for posting the details on how they ported Android 1.0 to the BeagleBoard.
The URL below currently links to work we did on the N810, but gives a background for Beagle, too. We'll update it with Beagle-specific info later.
hopobject.shortdesc: A port of Google's Android OS to BeagleBoard
